name: Cold Wordz
description:
This is a winter themed type-shooter. You type the words above corresponding enemies to kill them. Some take more hits than others and to make things harder, the words change every hit.

The game features 3 types of enemies: zombie (slow but takes the most hits to kill), crab (fast and can jump at the player) and a shooter zombie (can fire projectiles at the player).

You can also move around using the mouse click. Use it to run away from approaching enemies and their projectiles. Try playing with a friend if you're having trouble switching between the mouse and keyboard fast enough. Enjoy!

Made in C++/SDL2.
